title: Necromancer
summaries: The Necromancer is a Hardmode enemy found in the post-Plantera Dungeon. It is most common in areas backed by Brick Walls. These are identified by the related Faction Flag, the Necromantic Sign.

Necromancers attack by rapidly firing Shadow Beams at the player, rays of purple light which reflect off walls multiple times. They travel at an extremely high velocity, being fired nearly instantly, and inflict the <linked>Slow</linked> <linked>debuff</linked>. Necromancers teleport to a different location on-screen after firing six times or when being hit.
